name: Hilton Osaka
description: The Hilton Osaka is an oasis of sophisticated calm in one of the world’s greatest manufacturing and commercial cities. In the heart of Osaka’s main business, shopping and entertainment district stands the Hilton Osaka. The hotel is a 2-minute walk from the JR Osaka station, a 10-minute drive from the Shin Osaka bullet train station, 65 minutes by limousine bus from the Kansai International Airport, and a 25-minute drive from the Osaka Airport. Enjoy easy access to Osaka Castle, Osaka International Convention Center, INTEX Osaka, theme parks, Kobe, Nara and Kyoto. Hilton Osaka is adjacent to the shopping, dining and entertainment centers, the Hilton Plaza East/West and Herbis Ent complex. Superb comfort, unbeatable location, and personalized service make the award-winning Hilton Osaka the first choice for both business and pleasure. Choose from a selection of guest rooms to suit your every need. From our luxurious suites and Executive Rooms tailored to business needs, to or our modern and sophisticated Deluxe Rooms – there is an option to suit all your requirements. Hold an event in the well-equipped banquet and meeting facilities which can cater for small groups of just a few guests to functions of up to 1000.Hilton

name: Grand Prince Hotel Osaka Bay
description: Set in a prime location of Osaka, Hyatt Regency Osaka Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas. Television LCD/plasma screen, linens, towels, separate living room, internet access – wireless can be found in selected guestrooms. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Osaka, Hyatt Regency Osaka Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: W Osaka
description: Live it up in the dynamic heart of Osaka, Japan at W Osaka. Nestled in the fun-filled heart of Shinsaibashi, on Midosuji Boulevard, our vibrant and exciting pet-friendly hotel welcomes you to experience this fab city the W way. Reboot all your social needs amid the electric nightlife scenery of Dotonbori just around the corner. W Osaka seamlessly blends Japan’s celebrated cultural heritage with bold contemporary designs in a rarified milieu of playful chic and boundless luxury. Immerse yourself in super social, delicious dining experiences. Later, kick back in style in one of our extra-comfy hotel rooms and recharge for your next Osaka adventure.Marriott
